Description: Heavy maintenance tool repurposed as a bludgeon. Slow but devastating.
Electrified security baton. Fast attacks with a chance to stun.
Mountaineering axe scavenged from frozen exterior. Armor-piercing.
Improvised ranged weapon powered by train boiler pressure.
Welded scrap metal plates offering basic torso protection.
Reinforced maintenance suit with cold and impact resistance.
Threadbare clothing from the tail section. Minimal protection.
Standard-issue protein block. Restores 30 hunger.
Adrenaline injection. Temporarily boosts speed and stamina.
Field surgery supplies. Restores 50 health over 10 seconds.
Industrial heating compound. Reduces cold damage for 60 seconds.
Heavy brass key granting access to the Eternal Engine core.
Salvaged metal fragments useful for repairs and crafting.
Bundle of electrical wires for circuit repair.
Illicit psychoactive drug. Triggers time-perception ability but causes dependency.
Dense nutrition paste. The Tail's staple food. Restores 20 hunger.
Filtered condensation water. Restores 10 hunger.
Cloth strips tied tight. Restores 15 health.
Bent wire picks. Required for locked containers.
Basic electrical tools for disabling traps and alarms.
Sharpened screwdriver. Fast weak stabbing weapon.
Short pipe section. Reliable if crude.
Steel pipe with welded grip. Better weight distribution.
Commander Greys personal blade. Best melee weapon in Zone 1.
Standard-issue Jackboot ranged weapon. Reliable at distance.
Military-grade baton. Well balanced and durable.
Improvised incendiary. Thrown area damage.
Full Jackboot combat kit. Excellent protection.
Welded metal plate with arm straps. Blocks frontal damage.
Access card for Third Class section. Found on Commander Grey.
Opens the locked nursery cabinet in Car 4.
Torn fabric useful for bandages and wraps.
Volatile chemical from Kronole processing. Crafting material.
Sealed message from Gilliam to the front. Must not be opened.
Detailed report on Commander Greys left-side weakness.
Official orders found at Greys command post. Mentions Wilfords directive.
Scratched metal counting days since last revolt. Seven years.
